value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20745v1", "title": "A note on general linear link homology", "summary": "This expository note outlines why it is sometimes useful to consider the\nbigraded type A link homology theories as associated with the Lie algebras\ngl(N) instead of sl(N).", "main_category": "math.QA", "categories": "math.QA,math.GT", "published": "2025-04-29T13:26:46Z"}
